mapper.insert: insert into works (works_id, works_name, portfolio_name, second_por_name, wcreate_time, change_time, editor, wstatus, works_url, works_intro, works_updateman, works_spare, works_bintro, works_mpic, works_pic ) values (#{worksId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{worksName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{portfolioName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secondPorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wcreateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{changeTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{editor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{worksUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{worksIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{worksUpdateman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{worksSpare,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{worksBintro,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{worksMpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{worksPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update works set works_name = #{worksName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, portfolio_name = #{portfolioName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, second_por_name = #{secondPorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wcreate_time = #{wcreateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, change_time = #{changeTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, editor = #{editor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wstatus = #{wstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, works_url = #{worksUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, works_intro = #{worksIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, works_updateman = #{worksUpdateman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, works_spare = #{worksSpare,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, works_bintro = #{worksBintro,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, works_mpic = #{worksMpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, works_pic = #{worksPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where works_id = #{worksId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select works_id, works_name, portfolio_name, second_por_name, wcreate_time, change_time, editor, wstatus, works_url, works_intro, works_updateman, works_spare, works_bintro, works_mpic, works_pic from works where works_id = #{worksId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by change_time

select works_id, works_name, portfolio_name, second_por_name, wcreate_time, change_time, editor, wstatus, works_url, works_intro, works_updateman, works_spare, works_bintro, works_mpic, works_pic from works order by change_time
